sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Sets a default value of "0" for all test result counts on the test suite result table (sys_atf_test_suite_result)</description>
        <name>Default test suite result counts to 0</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function addDefaultToColumn(element) {
	var dictionaryGR = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
	dictionaryGR.addQuery("name", "sys_atf_test_suite_result");
	dictionaryGR.addQuery("element", element);
	dictionaryGR.query();

	if (!dictionaryGR.next()) {
		gs.warn("Unable to find dictionary entry for element '" + element + "'");
		return;
	}

	dictionaryGR.setValue("default_value", 0);
	if (!dictionaryGR.update()) {
		gs.warn("Unable to update dictionary entry for element '" + element + "'");
		return;
	}

	gs.info("Successfully updated dictionary entry for element '" + element + "'");
}

addDefaultToColumn("error_count");
addDefaultToColumn("failure_count");
addDefaultToColumn("skip_count");
addDefaultToColumn("success_count");
addDefaultToColumn("rolled_up_test_error_count");
addDefaultToColumn("rolled_up_test_failure_count");
addDefaultToColumn("rolled_up_test_skip_count");
addDefaultToColumn("rolled_up_test_success_count");
addDefaultToColumn("rolled_up_test_success_with_warnings_count");
addDefaultToColumn("rolled_up_test_canceled_count");
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-06-08 00:30:53</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4740a1e1431321106580a9bb1cb8f271</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Default test suite result counts to 0</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Automated Test Framework" source="com.glide.automated_testing_framework">ee18bcec3cb1311068bcf327dfe37fc8</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_4740a1e1431321106580a9bb1cb8f271</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-06-08 00:32:41</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Default test suite result counts to 0
